parameter.name: messagingGroup
parameter.description: Messaging group on which scoctoloc listens for picks to be processed.

parameter.name: pickAuthors
parameter.description:
Comma-separated list of allowed pick authors. Empty by default.
If specified, only picks with an author in this list will be processed. Useful if you run several pickers in parallel and want to restrict processing to only one of these.

parameter.name: targetMessagingGroup
parameter.description: Send generated objects to this messaging group.

parameter.name: originAuthor
parameter.description: The author ID that all new origins will have.

parameter.name: maxDepth
parameter.description: Max. hypocenter search depth in km.

parameter.name: minPickCountPAndS
parameter.description: Min. number of stations with both P and S pick

parameter.name: minPickCountPOrS
parameter.description: Min. number of stations with P or S pick, in other words min. number of picks.

parameter.name: center
parameter.description: Comma separated pair of numbers being the latitude and longitude of the network center.

parameter.name: radius
parameter.description: Network radius in km relative to the center.

parameter.name: model.csv
parameter.description: Filename of velocity model in csv format

parameter.name: model.const
parameter.description: Constant-velocity model specification consisting of one, two or three values representing P velocity, S velocity and density, respectively, with the latter two being optional and computed of missing.
